Visually, it appears as a smooth, white dome with a textured green sauce and vibrant red strawberries on the side.	<>	Panna cotta is a creamy Italian dessert made with milk, cream, and gelatin, often flavored and garnished with fresh fruit, a green herb sauce, and a dollop of whipped cream.	<>	Panna cotta is a creamy Italian dessert made from milk, cream, and gelatin, typically set with a thin layer of clear jelly on top, and often served with fresh fruits and a mint or fruit compote.	<>	Panna cotta is a creamy Italian dessert made from cream, sugar, and gelatin, often served with fresh strawberries and a drizzle of green pistachio sauce. It's typically cooked by setting the mixture in the refrigerator until set, then plated with fruit and sauce.	<>	Panna cotta is a creamy Italian dessert made from milk or cream and gelatin. It's often flavored with vanilla and topped with a vibrant green sauce, possibly herb-infused, and accompanied by fresh strawberries, creating a visually appealing contrast of white, green, and red.

This dessert is visually appealing with a smooth, glossy surface, often garnished with fresh fruits and a drizzle of caramel sauce or fruit juice.	<>	Panna cotta is a creamy Italian dessert made by setting a dairy or plant-based mixture with gelatin or agar. It's typically served with fruit, as seen here with raspberries and caramel sauce, and garnished with mint for a fresh touch. The dessert has a smooth, velvety texture with a light, elegant appearance, often presented on a white plate to enhance its visual appeal.	<>	Panna cotta is a creamy Italian dessert made from heavy cream and gelatin, set and served chilled. It is often garnished with fresh fruit, such as raspberries, and drizzled with caramel or honey sauce, creating a visually appealing contrast.	<>	Panna cotta is a creamy dessert made with milk and gelatin, set and served chilled. It is typically garnished with fresh fruits like raspberries and drizzled with a caramel sauce, presenting a smooth, creamy texture contrasted with the sweetness of the fruit and the golden drizzle.	<>	Panna cotta is a creamy dessert made from milk and gelatin, often topped with fresh fruits like raspberries and poached pears, and drizzled with a sweet syrup or honey. It's served in a smooth, round shape and is traditionally set in the refrigerator. The dish features a rich, velvety texture and a light, delicate flavor, making it a popular choice for special occasions or as a light dessert.
